_header: In Matthews gospel as we find
Note: For a different version in couplets see 4744.
_description: The VII Works of Mercy Bodily — fifteen quatrains

CamMagPep1584.First Lines:
In matheus gospell as we fyndeWhan crist schall cum in
                    maieste…
CamMagPep1584.Last Lines:
…Schall euer in blis a bide with meAnd þer to we schull
                    sey Amen
CamMagPep1584.Attributed Title:
Here foloweth þe vij werkys of mercy that euery man & woman shalbe
                    examined of at þe day of þe dom (f. 105); The vij Werkes of Mercy
                    (RT)
